• Include these codes as defined in http://www.ada.org/snodent
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    115902DCleft palate with cleft lipCleft palate with cleft lip
    117349DJuvenile rheumatoid arthritisJuvenile rheumatoid arthritis
    122924DHemifacial microsomiaHemifacial microsomia
    132578DCleft palateCleft palate
    133572DCleidocranial dysostosisCleidocranial dysostosis
    146718DTreacher Collins syndromeTreacher Collins syndrome
    149694DCleft lipCleft lip
    198545DComplete trisomy 21 syndromeComplete trisomy 21 syndrome
    199380DMarfan syndromeMarfan syndrome
    210958DCleft lip & alveolusCleft lip & alveolus
    210959DCraniosynostosis syndromeCraniosynostosis syndrome
    210960DArthrogryposisArthrogryposis

name: SnodentCraniofacialAnomalyInternational
title: SnodentCraniofacialAnomalyInternational
description:
The SNODENT identifiers for the most common craniofacial anomalies that may influence the course of orthodontic treatment to be performed.

This value set contains content from SNODENT® Copyright American Dental Association (ADA). All rights reserved. SNODENT is a registered trademark of the ADA.

http://www.ada.org/en/member-center/member-benefits/practice-resources/dental-informatics/snodent/licensing-snodent
